item.title: Fluid Scaling Technology and Open Space
item.description: Ever attended an Open Space conference?   They’re a personal favorite. While traditional “tracked” conferences offer value, I often find myself skipping sections that don’t pique my interest.

item.title: FaST in 5 Sentences
item.description: Fluid Scaling Technology in 5 Sentences   A TL;DR introduction to Fluid Scaling Technology (FaST). You can read more about FaST in the FaST Guide, but here’s a (very) simple overview of the process.
